gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 119, Pistons 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Jazz defeated the Pistons 119-111. Kelly Olynyk led the Jazz with a season-high 27 points, along with six assists, four steals, and three rebounds as Collin Sexton added 19 points, a season-high eight assists, and four steals. Cade Cunningham led the Pistons with 28 points, 10 assists, and seven rebounds as Jaden Ivey added 24 points, seven assists, and five rebounds. The Jazz improve to 11-18 as the Pistons move to 2-26 with the loss.
